metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2481 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The mm-video-v4l2 venc component in mediaserver in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-06-01mishandles a buffer count, which allows attackers to gain privileges via acrafted application, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature orSignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 27532497.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
